class.name: CATEIniSettingManagment
class.abstract: Adapter class for the CATIIniSettingManagment interface.

method.name: Commit
method.abstract: Committes the attribute values.

method.name: ResetToAdminValues
method.abstract: Restores the administration attribute values.

method.name: Rollback
method.abstract: Retrieves the last committed attribute values.

method.name: SaveRepository
method.abstract: Saves the attribute values on the disk.

class.name: CATIniCleanerSettingCtrl
class.abstract: Class to delete a setting controller.

method.name: GetController
method.abstract: Retrieves the setting controller.

method.name: SetController
method.abstract: Sets the setting controller.

class.name: CATIniInputDescriptionAdaptor
class.abstract: Adaptor class for CATIInputDescription.

method.name: GetFeatureType
method.abstract: Gets the type of the feature.

method.name: GetListOfModifiedFeatures
method.abstract: Retrieves the list of not drawn features.

method.name: GetMainInput
method.abstract: Retrieves the main input specification of the feature.

class.name: CATIniSearchEnumeration
class.abstract: Class defining operating signs for search criterion.

class.name: CATLISTP(CATISelectionSetElement_var)
class.abstract: Collection class for <tt>CATISelectionSetElement_var</tt>.

class.name: CATLISTP(CATListOfCATISelectionSet_var)
class.abstract: Collection class for <tt>CATListOfCATISelectionSet_var</tt>.

class.name: CATIBuildPath
class.abstract: Interface to build a CATPathElement from an object.

method.name: ExtractPathElement
method.abstract: Builds a CATPathElement from an object.

class.name: CATICCPable
class.abstract: Allows users to copy and/or delete the seleted element.

method.name: CanBeCopied
method.abstract: If the element can be copied.

method.name: CanBeDeleted
method.abstract: If the element can be deleted.

class.name: CATIIcon
class.abstract: Associate an icon.

method.name: GetIconName
method.abstract: Read the icon name.

method.name: SetIconName
method.abstract: Set the icon name.

class.name: CATIIniDocumentFiltersDefinition
class.abstract: Interface for layers filter management.

method.name: Add
method.abstract: Creates a filter.

method.name: Find
method.abstract: Retrieves a filter by its name.

method.name: GetCurrent
method.abstract: Retrieves the current filter.

method.name: GetList
method.abstract: Retrieves the layers filter list.

method.name: Remove
method.abstract: Removes a filter.

method.name: SetCurrent
method.abstract: Changes the current filter.

enum.name: FilterContentCheckMode
enum.abstract: Check mode for layer filter description.

class.name: CATIIniDocumentLayersDefinition
class.abstract: Interface for layer management.

method.name: Add
method.abstract: Adds a Layer.

method.name: Find
method.abstract: Retrieves a layer by its number.

method.name: Find
method.abstract: Retrieves a layer by its name.

method.name: GetCurrent
method.abstract: Retrieves the current layer.

method.name: GetList
method.abstract: Retrieves the layer list.

method.name: Remove
method.abstract: Removes a layer.

method.name: SetCurrent
method.abstract: Changes the current layer.

class.name: CATIIniInteractiveSession
class.abstract: Interface to handle documents or to exit during an interactive session.

method.name: Close
method.abstract: Closes a given document and closes all theirs windows.

method.name: Exit
method.abstract: Exits from the session.

method.name: New
method.abstract: Creates a document of a given type and opens a window to visualize it.

method.name: NewFrom
method.abstract: Creates a new document from one and opens window to visualize it.

method.name: Open
method.abstract: Opens a document and opens a window to visualize it.

method.name: Save
method.abstract: Saves a given document.

method.name: SaveAs
method.abstract: Saves an opened document under an another name.

class.name: CATIIniLayer
class.abstract: Interface to a layer.

method.name: GetName
method.abstract: Retrieves the layer name.

method.name: GetNumber
method.abstract: Retrieves the layer number.

class.name: CATIIniLayersFilter
class.abstract: Interface to a layers filter.

method.name: GetContents
method.abstract: Read the filter description.

method.name: GetName
method.abstract: Retrieves the filter name.

class.name: CATIIniSearchAndCriterion
class.abstract: Interface to define a logical AND complex criterion.

class.name: CATIIniSearchBooleanCriterion
class.abstract: Interface to define a boolean-based attribute criterion.

method.name: SetParameters
method.abstract: Sets all the parameters of the criterion.

class.name: CATIIniSearchColorCriterion
class.abstract: Interface to define a color-based search criterion.

method.name: FindColorNameFromRGBColorCode
method.abstract: Retrieves a color's name from the RGB code.

method.name: FindRGBColorCodeFromObject
method.abstract: Retrieves the object's RGB color code.

method.name: SetParameters
method.abstract: Sets the color parameters using the RGB code.

class.name: CATIIniSearchCombinationCriterion
class.abstract: Interface to define a logical complex criterion.

method.name: SetParameters
method.abstract: Sets the two criteria used in the logical operation.

class.name: CATIIniSearchContext
class.abstract: Class to define in which context the objects will be looked for.

method.name: GetNLSScope
method.abstract: Retrieves the scope in the NLS format.

method.name: GetReferenceObjectPath
method.abstract: Retrieves the reference object.

method.name: GetScope
method.abstract: Retrieves the enumeration value scope.

method.name: GetTransFormatScope
method.abstract: Retrieves the scope in the TransFormat format.

method.name: SetScope
method.abstract: Sets the scope from the dedicated enumeration.

method.name: SetScopeFromString
method.abstract: Sets the scope from a string.

enum.name: Scope
enum.abstract: Contexts value for a Search procedure.

class.name: CATIIniSearchCriterion

method.abstract: Retrieves a string-format criterion.

method.name: IsObjectMatching
method.abstract: Tests if an object matches the criterion.

class.name: CATIIniSearchServices
class.abstract: Class providing general services for analysing a query (string format of a criterion).

method.name: ConvertFromNLSToTransFormat
method.abstract: Converts an NLS query into a Transformat query.

method.name: ConvertFromTransFormatToNLS
method.abstract: Converts a TransFormat query into an NLS query.

method.name: CorrectString
method.abstract: Corrects a string before feeding it into a query.

method.name: DecodeStringToCriterion
method.abstract: Decodes a query into a criterion.

method.name: GetQueryAndContextFromString
method.abstract: Decomposes a complete query (i.

method.name: GetWildCardCharacter
method.abstract: Retrieves the wild characters.

method.name: TestNumValidity
method.abstract: Tests the validity of a string as a digital value.

method.name: TestNumValidity
method.abstract: Tests the validity of a string as a digital value with a unit.

class.abstract: Interface to define a string-based attribute criterion.

method.abstract: Sets all the parameters of the criterion.

method.abstract: Sets the weight parameter using a character string.

class.name: CATIIniSettingManagment
class.abstract: Interface to handle the controller of setting repository.

method.name: Commit
method.abstract: Makes a persistent copy of the setting file in Memory.

method.name: ResetToAdminValues
method.abstract: Restores the administrated values of the attributes.

method.name: Rollback
method.abstract: Restores a previous persistent copy of the setting file in Memory.

method.name: SaveRepository
method.abstract: Makes a persistent copy of the setting file on file.

class.name: CATIInputDescription
class.abstract: Interface defining feature integration to the linearity concepts applied to Ordered Geometrical Set.

method.name: GetFeatureType
method.abstract: Retrieves the type of the feature.

method.name: GetListOfModifiedFeatures
method.abstract: Retrieves the list of absorbed features.

method.name: GetMainInput
method.abstract: Retrieves the main input specification of the feature.

class.name: CATIOrientationFlag
class.abstract: Interface to manage the orientation status of an element.

method.name: GetInverse
method.abstract: Gets the inverse element.

method.name: IsInversed
method.abstract: Gets the inverse status of the element.

method.name: SetInverse
method.abstract: Sets an inverse status on the element.

class.name: CATIReplacable
class.abstract: Replace authorization.

method.name: AllowReplace
method.abstract: Replace authorization.

method.name: FindValidElementForReplace
method.abstract: Find the replacing element.

class.name: CATISelectionSet
class.abstract: Interface to manage the elements of a Selection Set.

method.name: AddElement
method.abstract: Adds a new element.

method.name: FindElement
method.abstract: Finds an element in the Selection Set.

method.name: GetElementPath
method.abstract: Computes the CATPathElement of the Selection Set element.

method.name: GetSize
method.abstract: Returns the count of elements in the Selection Set.

method.name: IsMember
method.abstract: Returns a status about the presence of the element in the Selection Set.

method.name: IsMember
method.abstract: Returns a status about the presence of the Selection Set element in the Selection Set.

method.name: ListElement
method.abstract: Retrieves the list of elements.

method.name: RemoveAllElements
method.abstract: Removes all elements.

method.name: RemoveElement
method.abstract: Removes an element.

class.name: CATISelectionSetElement
class.abstract: Interface to handle a Selection Set element.

method.name: Compare
method.abstract: Compares the path of this and another path.

method.name: Compare
method.abstract: Compares this with another Selection Set element.

method.name: ComputePath
method.abstract: Computes the initial path of the Selection Set element.

method.name: ComputePathWithContext
method.abstract: Computes the updated path of the Selection Set element.

method.name: GetPointedElement
method.abstract: Returns pointed element.

class.name: CATISelectionSetsFactory
class.abstract: Interface to manage the Selection Sets in a document.

method.name: BeginFindOwningSets
method.abstract: Starts a transaction with several FindOwningSets calls.

method.name: CreateSelectionSet
method.abstract: Creates a new Selection Set.

method.name: DeleteSelectionSet
method.abstract: Removes a Selection Set.

method.name: EndFindOwningSets
method.abstract: Ends a transaction with several FindOwningSets calls.

method.name: FindOwningSets
method.abstract: Finds all the Selection Sets that contain the searched element.

method.name: FindSelectionSets
method.abstract: Retrieves the list of Selection Sets from his name.

method.name: GetCurrent
method.abstract: Current Selection Set management.

method.name: ListSelectionSets
method.abstract: Retrieves all Selection Sets.

method.name: SetCurrent
method.abstract: Current Selection Set management.
